events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team. Our recruiters will soon review your submission.
Your profile has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your software development experience and skills listed in your CV.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out shortly to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call to evaluate your background and fit for the Software Engineer position. The conversation went well and showed great alignment with our needs.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm after the screening call. We appreciate your eagerness to proceed with the technical round.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior engineering team members.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in the required technologies.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and other relevant topics.
You completed the HR interview and expressed clear interest in joining our team. We look forward to moving ahead with the final steps.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role that includes competitive compensation and benefits. Please review and let us know your decision.
Thank you for accepting our offer. We are thrilled to welcome you aboard and will begin the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding has officially started. You will be receiving schedules, introductions, and resources to help you integrate smoothly into our engineering team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your entry into the company. Welcome again and we look forward to your contributions as a Software Engineer.
